items.title: LLMs for Failure Mode Classification
items.description: Michael Stewart's presentation on our investigation into using Large Language Models (LLMs) for Failure Mode Classification.

items.title: CyIE: EACL2023 presentation
items.description: Chau Nguyen's presentation of "CyIE: Cylinder Embeddings for Multi-hop Reasoning over Knowledge Graphs" at EACL2023.

items.title: Seq2KG - KR2020 presentation
items.description: Michael Stewart's presentation of "Seq2KG: An End-to-End Neural Model for Domain Agnostic Knowledge Graph (not Text Graph) Construction from Text" for KR2020.

items.title: Redcoat - Video demo
items.description: A video demonstration of "Redcoat - A Collaborative Annotation Tool for Hierarchical Entity Typing" for EMNLP 2019.

items.title: Research Bytes: Unlocking knowledge buried within technical records
items.description: Technical records such as safety logs and maintenance work orders contain a wealth of critical information, yet they are seriously under utilised. We demonstrate how "technical language processing" can be employed to unlock this buried knowledge and provide significant benefit to industry professionals.
